description: Trees, broadleaf, deciduous or with dominant deciduous component
notes: May be drought or cold deciduous. Includes deciduous and semi-deciduous species. Mixed forest should be counted as deciduous if more than half of canopy trees are deciduous (if specified).

description: Trees, conifer (needleleaf), deciduous or with dominant deciduous component.
notes: Includes deciduous and semi-deciduous species. Mixed forest should be counted as deciduous if more than half of canopy trees are deciduous (if specified).

description: Trees, broadleaf and/or conifer, deciduous or with dominant deciduous component.
notes: Includes deciduous and semi-deciduous species. May be drought or cold deciduous. Mixed forest should be counted as deciduous if more than half of canopy trees are deciduous (if specified). Dominant species may be a mix of broadleaf and needleleaf species, or leaf type was not specified.
Dominant species may be a mix of broadleaf and needleleaf species, or leaf type was not specified.
Dominant species are a mix of deciduous and evergreen species, or leaf habit not specified.
Dominant species are a mix of deciduous and evergreen species, or leaf habit not specified.

Leaf type/phenology unknown. This code was originally used to refer to the 2TM category, and some records coded as '2TREE' may be identifiable as '2TM' based on information in the original publication.
